DEMO_826_MSG_010: ̂Sorry for making you wait so long, Lenate. We're here now, though...
DEMO_826_MSG_170:
́Behold my new form, to accompany my newfound 
abilities... I am now Dark-Almighty!
DEMO_826_MSG_180: ́You have no chance against me now, ȁ!
DEMO_826_MSG_030: ̂Lenate!? What's the meaning of this? After we went to so much trouble... tell us why!
DEMO_826_MSG_060:
̂Dark Master!? But... ȁ already
defeated you... how can this be!?
DEMO_826_MSG_070:
́Technically speaking... yes, I was defeated at his hand. However... he only defeated my physical form.
ā
DEMO_826_MSG_080: ́Luckily, Snapped-Almighty's powers preserved my soul, and kept my spirit alive!
DEMO_826_MSG_090:
̂This is insane... if Snapped-Almighty truly had restored
your form, then where were you previously...
DEMO_826_MSG_100: ́Right... upon losing my physical form, there was not much I could do. I had to figure out how to get a new body.
DEMO_826_MSG_110:
̂So, that's it then... you waited for us to bring that
Planet Seed here, didn't you!?
DEMO_826_MSG_120:
́Hmm-hmm-hmm, precisely. Once we had access to all of
Mother's data, I had planned that as my last line of defense...
DEMO_826_MSG_130:
́The moment Lenate sacrificed herself to stabilize 
Mother... I knew you'd be back with that Planet Seed!
ā
DEMO_826_MSG_140:
́For me, it was just a matter of patience... biding my time
while you two did all of the heavy lifting.
ā
DEMO_826_MSG_150: ́How rude of me... I suppose I must thank you, after all... you two did overcome some impossible odds just to save me.
DEMO_826_MSG_160:
́Not only did you help restore me... but you've now
given me the Gods' power of Creation and Destruction!
